constraints.name: adjacent_spread
constraints.description: 选择一个节点后，其左右相邻的节点也会受到相同的影响（图中的扩散约束）
constraints.formal: If node i is chosen, then nodes i-1 and i+1 (if alive) are also affected.

constraints.name: node_alive_condition
constraints.description: 节点只有在值大于0时才被认为是活跃的（图中节点的存活条件）
constraints.formal: Node i is alive if a_i > 0.

constraints.name: damage_decrement
constraints.description: 每次操作对选定节点及其相邻节点的值减少相同的固定值k（图中节点值的减法约束）
constraints.formal: a_i = max(0, a_i - k) for the chosen node and its adjacent nodes.
